Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory393.jpg'}
{3: 'The morning sun bestows its gentle touch upon the land. Amidst the blossoming flowers, a girl stands, basking in the radiant glow.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Roaming through the sea of vibrant hues, the hero extends her arms, trying to embrace every tide surrounding her.', 4: '1'}
{3: '...Until Mr. Guardian appears in the distance, standing firm with a sword in hand to confront the hero.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'However, heeding the scene before him, he somehow chooses to lower his weapon.'}
{3: 'Then, at a delightful pace, Mr. Guardian cheerfully capers into the embrace of the flower sea...'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Why is it like this sea of flowers has some special allure?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'And how do you want to introduce the conflict...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'What about this?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Seeing that Mr. Guardian has trampled on the flowers, the hero immediately stops and calls out to him.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hero', 3: "Please don't step on the flowers. They are saying it hurts a lot.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Despite being forced back to the edge of the flower sea, Mr. Guardian persists in his return.'}
{3: 'After several failed attempts to stop Mr. Guardian from damaging the flowers, the hero finally cannot take it anymore.'}
{2: 'Hero', 3: 'You shall taste...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{2: 'Hero', 3: 'The wrath of the flowers!!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Holding up her weapon, the hero charges toward Mr. Guardian.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'A fierce battle erupts, each participant striving to force the other out of the flower sea...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Wouldn't this reason for conflict be... a bit too mild? Don't you think it lacks some... captivating impact?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "But I... I don't think I can come up with other reasons for a battle.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Those flowers carry a special meaning for the hero... for example?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Or, having sensed the threat the Realm Guardian poses, the hero raises her weapon for self-defense?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Hmm... I think Lucia might be able to offer some ideas in that direction.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv casts her gaze on Lucia, who has been listening carefully aside.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Do you really think I can? I've never tried to write any script...", 4: '1'}
{2: "Don't worry. You can give it a shot first.", 3: '223', 4: "You'll be okay. I believe in you!", 5: '223'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Right, give it a try first!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'If you have trouble finding inspiration along the way, we can work together to figure it out.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Alright... I'll try it first.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'A fierce conflict... Battle... New enemy, maybe...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Okay, I've got an idea. I'm starting.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The morning sun bestows its gentle touch upon the land. Amidst the blossoming flowers, a girl stands, basking in the radiant glow.'}
{3: 'Roaming through the sea of vibrant hues, the hero extends her arms, trying to embrace every tide surrounding her.'}
{3: '...Until Mr. Guardian appears in the distance, standing firm with a sword in hand to confront the hero.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Yeah, I think it's a great scene to start with... Do you think it needs adjustment, Lee?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '...No need. So, what happens next?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Instead of offering any response to the hero, Mr. Guardian remains motionless in a distorted posture...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Realm Guardian', 3: 'Roarrr—', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryBlackSmokeNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1'}
{3: 'Suddenly, he erupts into a fearsome roar, while dark mist seeps out from the crevices of his armor.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Even the wind seems tainted with an ominous hue, gusting forcefully through the sea of flowers.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'It spares no living being along its path—flowers wilt and leaves crumble, everything falling into its demise.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Nice tension built up there. Give me more!'}
{3: 'Mr. Realm Guardian raises his sword, resting it upon his shoulder.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Meanwhile, the hero directs her weapon toward him, seemingly determined to jolt him back to his senses through the use of force.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryBlackSmokeNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'A one-on-one? Judging from their data, the hero still has quite a significant advantage.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Considering the current status of both parties, the hero has an over 99% chance of winning.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Oh... I forgot about that. Then, let me make an adjustment.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "It's not only Mr. Guardian alone but two guardians.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Wait. Actually, it should be three guardians.', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "It still doesn't seem enough. Then, I'll make it a group of guardians.", 4: '1', 5: '2', 6: '3'}
{1: '1', 3: 'At this moment, the guardians cluster on the battlefield, like a vast array of wholesale products on display.', 4: '1', 5: '2', 6: '3'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "There are too many guardians. The hero won't even stand a chance against them.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Emm... I just think it'd be easier to create an epic battle this way.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'But the guardian should be a character of exclusivity.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Maybe you can try other methods to build up tension.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'This feels beyond my capabilities. Any suggestions, Lee?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'I may have a feasible proposal.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'In that case, Ayla, shall we let Lee handle this part?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "But I can't guarantee the final outcome due to the lack of practical data.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Never hurts to try.', 3: '803', 4: 'You can start to collect it right now!', 5: '805'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "I'm very interested in Lee's proposal too!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "...Why do I feel you've been having fun watching this?", 4: '1'}
{2: "It's priceless to see my team members pushing their limits.", 3: '900'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Fine, I'll give it a shot.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Feel free to let your imagination fly, Lee.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Alright... I'm starting it.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The morning sun bestows its gentle touch upon the land. Amidst the blossoming flowers, a girl stands, basking in the radiant glow.'}
{3: 'Roaming through the sea of vibrant hues, the hero extends her arms, trying to embrace every tide surrounding her...'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Pause. Let's fast-forward to skip this part."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{3: 'After a rapid whirring noise...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Realm Guardian', 3: 'Roarrr—', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hero', 3: 'Mr. Guardian, this seems to be the only way to bring you back to your senses.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Holding the weapon that appears out of thin air, the hero casts a resolute gaze upon her opponent.'}
{2: 'Hero', 3: 'Get ready for my attack with a powerful damage bonus of 23! Super—', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Realm Guardian', 3: 'Hold on.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Realm Guardian', 3: 'Since the darkness has corrupted me, I should be able to summon a dark creature.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Realm Guardian', 3: 'Then, I choose to summon this—Spectral Dragon.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The air stirs with a gust, accompanied by a fierce roar. A giant creature makes its appearance as if returning from the depths of Hell itself.', 4: '3'}
{3: 'Spectral Dragon, HP: 3000.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{2: 'Spectral Dragon', 3: '...', 4: '3'}
{3: 'The peculiar confrontation persists, their hollow stares locked onto each other, until the hero finally reaches her breaking point.', 4: '2', 5: '3'}
{2: 'Hero', 3: 'Creator, you should really take a look at the creature he summoned. This makes no sense.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hero', 3: "Seriously, is it normal for a normal creature to have such ridiculously high HP? It's making me look like a total weakling!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "This is no normal creature but a special demon that's not from this land.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'A special demon?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Yes. It's from a place outside this land, which allows the setting to reasonably extend beyond the boundaries of the original framework.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Extend beyond... the boundaries of the original framework... Lee, mind if I ask where you found the inspiration?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'I did research on the Golden Age data about how to design a sequel for a concluded story, and this is what I got from the analysis.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Excuse me... I have a question.', 3: '149'}
{2: "If there's a sequel later...", 3: '150'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Then it can be a demon from hell.', 4: '1'}
{2: "If there's a second...", 3: '152'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Then it can be an ancient demon from the depths of hell.', 4: '1'}
{2: "If there's a third...", 3: '154'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'A demon from another world.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lee appears completely convinced by this theory, his tone unwaveringly firm.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Theoretically, by incorporating settings that transcend the limitations of the existing framework, it's feasible to extend the story endlessly.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Based on the analysis of existing data, this method is the most efficient approach for developing sequels.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "...Lee, you've never read those long serialized web novels from the Golden Age, right? I'm talking about the ones with hundreds of chapters.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "That's why I have to say this: Cuuuut!", 4: '2'}
{3: "Ayla intentionally elongates the pronunciation of the word, simultaneously initiating a reset in the program, grounding everyone's thoughts back to reality."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory526.jpg'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Did you find any flaw in the logic?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "In theory, you're indeed correct, but if we do it that way...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "As the person in charge of the script, I'll most likely end up being hung like a teru teru bozu on the balcony of WGAA for public criticism.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Guess I'm indeed not cut out for this kind of job.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'As I told you just now, your theory is correct.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'No doubt about it, Mr. Guardian is no longer the right fit for the role of the main villain. We should introduce some new foes for our hero.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'But what kind of settings should we go with?', 3: '250'}
{3: "Seated around the table, everyone's face is etched with perplexity."}
{3: 'Before you lies an open document titled "Shooting Plan for Dragon Boat Festival Film Sequel".'}
{3: "Clueless about the next step, everyone's thoughts involuntarily drift back to the moment when Celica entrusted you with the task."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: 'The special film we made for the Dragon Boat Festival before was well received.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'You mean the one where we defeated OVERLORD CELICA?', 3: '300'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'Defeated? Why do I remember it was someone taking the lead to snatch the key item and escape the scene using a dirty trick?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'It was a tactical retreat...'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "Ahem... Anyway, we've received quite some positive reviews on that heroic adventure story.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "And after some discussion, we decided to release a sequel during this year's Dragon Boat Festival event.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'A story about the heroes returning to the Realm of Dragons one year after their initial departure.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory526.jpg'}
{3: 'Therefore, for the script of the sequel...'}
{3: 'Gray Raven and Ayla have stayed at WGAA for an entire afternoon.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory393.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Realm Guardian', 3: 'Finally, you decided to give me a break! May the dragons bless you.', 4: '1'}
